summary: Analyzed 3 temporal/modal sorries. Temporal sorries (TruthLemma.lean:158,168) require omega-saturation for backward coherence - deriving G phi from universal phi membership. Modal sorry (Construction.lean:220) requires phi->Box phi which fails for single-family BMCS. Recommended: add backward coherence fields to IndexedMCSFamily, accept as construction assumptions for constantIndexedMCSFamily, optionally implement multi-family construction for modal saturation.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of omega-rule limitation for temporal sorries and modal saturation requirements, with three implementation strategies evaluated
